name: Outerversal Prevention
description:
THIS GAME HAS ONLY BEEN TESTED ON MOZILLA FIREFOX

I'm aware of the "getting stuck in platforms" glitch, sadly I don't know if I'm allowed to make bug fixes post-jam.

You are a human who had lived 20 years of their life in the future. In that future, you saw witness to eldritch creatures invading Earth, intent on enslaving all of humanity, and succeeding. A strange being has offered you the chance to prevent this future from happening.

Set trek upon a bleak planet and climb a tower to confront the eldritch leader, collecting powers along the way to aid you.

This was done in 2 weeks for Rev's Game Jam 2. Expect imperfections.

If you find things too difficult, try pressing the 9 key. It's a heal cheat.
